de.intarsys.security.smartcard.card

Interface ICardTerminal

  • All Superinterfaces:
    de.intarsys.tools.attribute.IAttributeSupport, de.intarsys.tools.event.INotificationSupport
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommonCardTerminal, NoCardTerminal, StandardCardTerminal

    public interface ICardTerminal
extends de.intarsys.tools.event.INotificationSupport, de.intarsys.tools.attribute.IAttributeSupport
    The abstraction of a single terminal, optionally containing a token, connected to the system.

    ICardTerminal monitors the state of the associated terminal / token in a thread of its own as long as connected.

    ICardTerminal is used in a multithreaded environment and its state is accessed by either its monitoring thread or the client code . Ensure thread safe implementation for IAttributeSupport!
